title: How to become a software tester - Quora

response.answer_text: Present times are the best to turn into a software tester. With automation, IoT, machine learning and much more revolutionary technology emerging, the demand for software testers are higher than ever! But you asked a great question? How does one become a software tester? Becoming a tester would require many soft skills. Innovative thinking, excellent communication and the ability to coordinate in a DevOps environment. → Learning comes as the first priority. Especially now, when the software industry is evolving at a rapid speed. People consider writing codes and debugging is a developer’s job. But as a tester, it is necessary to have a knowledge about all the languages too. As a tester, automation testing is one of the biggest tools in your tool shed, and it is all about coding. This is just an example there are many other cases which require knowledge of coding like for example white-box testing, API testing, even performance and load testing. Here are a few languages that software tester should know before they deep dive as an online tester for any website. JavascriptPopular Frameworks for Javascript: → Cucumber JS→ Nightwatch→ Protractor 2. Java Popular Framework for Java: → Gauge→ TestNG→ Junit 3. Python Popular Frameworks for Python: → PyUnit→ Lettuce→ Behave 4. C# Popular Frameworks for C#: → Visual Studio unit testing framework→ SpecFlow→ Nunit 5. PHP Popular Frameworks for PHP: → Codeception→ Behat→ SimpleTest 6. Ruby Popular Frameworks for Ruby: → Capybara→ RSpec→ Minitest Other than these languages, it is vital that you stick to different contemporary testing strategies. Accessibility Testing – To make sure your software is accessible to all, including people with special disabilities.Usability Testing – Testing of a website for its usability concerning user satisfaction.Exploratory Testing – Testing approach that includes simultaneous learning, test designing and test execution.Regression Testing – Testing the whole application after any new change has been made. The idea here is to check that the new change is not disrupting any of the pre-existing functionality.With digital discovery being more mobile-centric it is crucial that you be ready for mobile web pages with regression testing.Cross Browser Testing – Testing to ensure that your web app is operable through different browsers, across various devices with different screen sizes.→ Learn about the fundamentals of automation testing and the tool used for different types. Also, note some important frameworks like Selenium, Appium, Gauge etc. You should also go for online platforms like Udemy, Coursera etc. to learn about the upcoming software trends and cut in the software industry. → Know the criticality of the staging or QA environment, also be knowledgeable of the SDLC(Software Development Life Cycle) and your role and responsibilities as a tester in SDLC. → Prepare a brilliant resume. A resume is very critical to highlight you above the rest. So give it proper time and though and use an online service to get you an awesome resume ready. → Let the companies know that you are available. Post your availability on multiple online job portals. → Research on interview questions for the role of the software tester. If you are up and ready with the above-mentioned factors then you will definitely be placed above the other candidates. Then its time for you to make a stand in front of the interviewers. Be bold and honest about what you know. Also, keep your pitch ready to encounter questions about your strengths and weaknesses. Remember, to highlight a corrective action when you mention a weakness. Happy Testing,Harshit Paul

Foundation is very important. Don’t think you are learning basics.Take best training on latest technologies, API testing, WebServices Testing using SoapUI tool, ETL Testing, Mobile Apps Testing, Selenium Automation Testing training and more.Learn about Test plan, test cases, RTM, Security testing, SQL, Joins, UNIX / Linux, Web servers, App Servers, Basic programming languages like Java, Python scripting, Java Script, HTML etc.Hands on Practice on real time like projects. This is highly important to get job.Practice mock interviews, take the feedback and fix the issues after mock interviews.Prepare a good resume, do not copy and paste from some other people.Review the resume by experienced people.Create a short 2 minute video based resume / profile and make it private. do not share with every one.Post your resume in job boards like Dice.com, monster.com, techfetch.com, Indeed etc.Ready for face to face interview. you need to tell the vendor / client that you are ready for face to face interview.Build confidence.Try to avoid lying like “ I am strong in SQL joins” but when you answer you don’t even give any example or proper explanation but just reading definition. Interviewer understand that you don’t have any experience and know only theory.If you prepare technically strong no one can stop you.Good Luck.. God Bless you to become a good Software QA Tester.
